page.title: 02Sandringham Estate
page.content:
The Sandringham Estate forms the focal point for the many people who visit this area of Norfolk each year. At the centre is The House standing in typical, rolling, English parkland. In the surrounding woods, there are nature trails along which a proliferation of wildlife can be observed.
Although The Estate is a major tourist attraction it is essentially a working estate where animals are reared and crops grown.
The Estate is in the hands of The Queen's Agent and there are more than 100 workers employed in a wide range of jobs.
